info.title: Maintenance Bill of Material
info.description: This service enables you to create, update, or delete the bill of material header and item. It is based on the OData protocol and can be consumed in SAP Fiori apps and on other user interfaces. The service contains header and item nodes for the bill of material. When performing an operation, the necessary information is sent in the request as a payload. All information used when creating a maintenance BOM is checked for restricted values and authorizations.

x-sap-shortText: Create, update and delete the Maintenance Bill of Material using the asynchronous inbound service

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET BOMItem HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--
